audioText: Honnêtement, ce consultant financier n'a pas donné les bons conseils à mes clients.
question: What does the speaker say about the financial consultant?
options: The consultant didn't give good advice to their clients
The consultant was very honest with their clients
The consultant charged too much for their services
The consultant needs more time to help their clients
explanation: The text states 'Honnêtement, ce consultant financier n'a pas donné les bons conseils à mes clients' - Honestly, this financial consultant didn't give good advice to my clients. 'Honnêtement' means 'honestly' or 'frankly'. The distractors test misinterpretation of the speaker's opinion (was very honest, charged too much, needs more time).
